column4: I have an ASUS Apire One netbook and I had WinXP installed on it with Ubuntu dual boot. Yesterday I was trying to remove the recent documents on 10.10 Netbook and I was able to remove them from the Dekstop GUI but not the Netbook GUI so I then decided to Reinstall Ubuntu from a LiveUSB... Now I am not even able to access any of the operating systems...
Seems like GRUB is damaged and I can't even access the Asus eRecovery to restore the computer to factory state..
if you only have 1 OS, grub2 doesn't display.  check into grub2 basics on http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1195275
had no idea there was a recovery partition for that.  If so, your installation MAY have deleted it.
